title: Miles Sanders and Dan Marino Interviews; DFS Talk (01/29 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
We are joined by Miles Sanders (0:44) as he discusses his role in the passing game, what's in store for him next season, why Fantasy owners should draft him and more ... Ryan Wilson hops on to talk about the Senior Bowl (10:00) as the guys review some of the top 2020 draft prospects ... Dan Marino joins us (25:35)! We of course compare him to Patrick Mahomes and we ask him how he would have liked throwing eight passes in a game as Jimmy Garoppolo did in the NFC Championship Game. Then we get into KC-SF with some DFS talk (37:50). Which RB should you pay up for? ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
